lyrics_abstract:
Rob the jewelry store and tell em make me a grill
And da whole top diamond and the bottom row's gold

[J.D.]
Yo, we 'bout to start an epidemic with this one
Ya'll know what dis is, so So Def

[Nelly]
Got 30 down at the bottom, 30 more at the top
All invisible set with little ice cube blocks
If I could call it a drink, call it a smile on the rocks
If I could call out a price, let's say I call out a lot

I got like platinum and white gold, traditional gold
I'm changin' grillz everyday, like Jay change clothes
I might be grilled out nicely (oh)in my white tee (oh)
Or on South Beach (oh) in my wife b

V[...]
